tool_description: Used to verify GST certificates of merchants and vendors.
name: GST Verification
title: GST Verification

api_list.name: GST Verification API (Sync)
api_list.description: Used to verify GST certificates of vendors and merchants.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gst-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_gst_certificate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gst-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
